message.body: Your on mon wed are u avail sat or sun?
Hey, sorry i missed this txt yesterday, ive got family stuff going on in philly so ill be away the next two weekends, so ill be on mon, wed this week and next
We have to switch to an employee model tomorrow. We need to have dri vers working a min 3 days a week. If you cant meet the min I hAve to ask you not to show up this week. Sorry man
